hero.name: {{name}}
hero.description: Computer Technician specialized in Internet Technologies, I develop complete web applications, working both on the front-end with React, JS and TS, and on the back-end with Python and Django REST.

desktop.text_1: I am a <highlight>Computer Technician specialized in Internet Technologies, certified by IFRN.</highlight> Throughout the course, I have been developing my skills and improving my knowledge. Today, I have experience in web development, working on both the <highlight>front-end</highlight> and <highlight>back-end</highlight>. During the four years of the program, I was able to learn how to work as part of a team and apply the knowledge I gained in various projects. I learned about <highlight>Databases</highlight> and also completed a full project using <highlight>React, TypeScript, and Django REST</highlight>, which helped me further solidify my skills.
desktop.text_2: My first contact with the job market was as a <highlight>scholarship holder at the <link1>Centro de Soluções Aplicadas (CSA)</link1>,</highlight> where I learned to use <highlight>WordPress</highlight>. I am currently an <highlight>intern in front-end development at <link2>Maxmeio</link2></highlight>, where I mainly use <highlight>Tailwind and Bootstrap</highlight> integrated with <highlight>Laravel</highlight> on a daily basis.

mobile.text_1: I am a <highlight>Computer Technician specialized in Internet Technologies, certified by IFRN.</highlight> I have experience in web development, working on both the <highlight>front-end</highlight> and <highlight>back-end</highlight>. I learned about <highlight>Databases</highlight> and also completed a full project using <highlight>React, TypeScript, and Django REST</highlight>, which helped me further solidify my skills.
mobile.text_2: My first contact with the job market was as a <highlight>scholarship holder at the <link1>Centro de Soluções Aplicadas (CSA)</link1>,</highlight> where I worked using <highlight>WordPress</highlight>. I am currently an <highlight>intern in front-end development at <link2>Maxmeio</link2></highlight>, where I mainly use <highlight>Tailwind and Bootstrap</highlight> integrated with <highlight>Laravel</highlight> on a daily basis.
